case.name: University of Western Australia v Gray (No 6) [2006] FCA 1656 (1 December 2006)

citphrases.citphrase: power of court to order production of documents discovered
duty of solicitor in so certifying
discovery of single item comprising voluminous unsorted records including irrelevant material

citances.sentence: 6 The decision refusing the University's application was given on 1 December 2006: The University of Western Australia v Gray (No 6) [2006] FCA 1656. I noted in the reasons that Dr Gray did not contend that the material sought was irrelevant. He argued rather that it was of "tangential" relevance.
